title: DNA testing company relaunches in US
text: DNA testing company relaunches in US Thursday, 22 October 2015 (13 minutes ago) A company has relaunched in the US after the Food and Drug Administration approved its DNA tests for 36 diseases. 23andMe May Regain Crown as King of Consumer Genetic Testing 01:06 For the first time in almost two years, the government is allowing genetics company 23andMe to tell its customers whatâ€™s wrong with their DNA. According to Fusion.net, starting Wednesday the company is reviving its genetic health report. The report gives consumers information about whether they are... Recent related news
